CaretPosition.summary:
The CaretPosition interface represents the caret position, an indicator for the text insertion point.
You can get a CaretPosition using the method.

CaretPositionOffset.summary: The offset property of the interface returns an integer representing the offset of the selection in the caret position node.

remarks.para: This will be the character offset in a text node or the selected child node's index in an element node.

CaretPositionOffsetNode.summary: The offsetNode property of the interface returns a containing the found node at the caret's position.

CaretPositionGetClientRect.summary: The getClientRect() method of the interface returns the client rectangle for the caret range.
